# Yengo

## Example

```html
<amp-ad width="300" height="250" type="yengo" data-block-id="152431"> </amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For more information, please [see Yengo's FAQ](http://www.yengo.com/text/faqs?publishers).

### Required parameters

-   `data-block-id`
